text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the ASUS ROG Zephyrus  GX701GX-XB78 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Zephyrus  GX701GX-XB78 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Zephyrus  GX701GX-XB78 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the ASUS ROG Zephyrus  GX701GX-XB78 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Zephyrus  GX701GX-XB78 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
